name: SOA Training Solutions
tag_list: soa, oracle, training, online, dvd, recording, free, bpel, 11g
description: Providing training in Oracle SOA Product
overview:
We provide online and self paced trainings (recordings) for Oracle SOA 11g and 10g

Some highlights of the course

â€¢ Training is structured as 14 sessions of 3 hours each, so that you get introduced to one concept at a time and get enough time to practice that one concept. â€¢ Sessions would be held on weekends. â€¢ The batches are scheduled at 7:30 AM IST to 10:30 AM IST â€¢ If one misses any lecture, there is a provision to get the recording of that session, subject to a maximum of 2 recordings overall. â€¢ The training is provided over the web using webconferencing software, so you just need a computer to attend it. Both video and sound shall come through the computer â€¢ The trainer can take control of your machine and assist you in resolving any issues â€¢ Detailed notes is provided on each topic and step by step instructions will be provided to execute the exercises â€¢ Each topic will be explained using live demo of the concept, starting from scratch â€¢ Support for 2 months from the end date of the training
